name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
desc:
A Fatui mage who can command Cryo Cicins in battle. Their origins and what they look like under that mask are both mysteries.
Reason dictates that those who lack Visions should not be able to control the elements as these mages do. However, in addition to using Mist Grass to control the Cryo Cicins, they also boldly wield the might of frost. Seeing them as they wander the land in their seemingly aimless way, one can't help but wonder about the duty that must compel them...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Mist Grass Pollen
dropMaterial.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

dropMaterial.name: Mist Grass
dropMaterial.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

dropMaterial.name: Mist Grass Wick
dropMaterial.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

dropMaterial.name: Recruit's Insignia
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

dropMaterial.name: Sergeant's Insignia
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

dropMaterial.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

value.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
value.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.
